meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uppity or snobbish.
meanings.sent1: Her uppityness was evident in the way she looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: His uppityness made it difficult for him to make friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite her uppityness, she couldn't resist joining in the fun.
meanings.sent4: The uppityness of the cat as it walked by was unmistakable.
meanings.sent5: The uppityness of the queen bee was clear as she buzzed around the hive.

meanings.definition: Behavior or attitude that is arrogant or presumptuous.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was taken aback by the student's uppityness in class.
meanings.sent2: His uppityness often rubbed his classmates the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: The dog's uppityness when demanding treats was both amusing and annoying.
meanings.sent4: The uppityness of the squirrel as it stole the bird's food was comical.
meanings.sent5: Her uppityness shone through as she cut the line at the grocery store.
